items.content:
I buy Bitcoin and do nothing

No charts
No earnings calls
No timing anything
No nothing…

I use all that time I used to waste on research and managing a portfolio to spend with my new daughter, wife, my friends, and many hobbies 

Bitcoin gave me a simple life

items.content: As always, the narrative fairytales are useless. The time to buy was when the technical chart gave the signal. DO NOT use narratives for trading/investing...use technical charts. Why? Because they expose the REAL narratives when it matters, NOT when it's too late.

items.content: Crypto - It's over. It peaked versus gold in 2021. Just deal with that fact. It's down 61% from that peak. It failed to make a new high against gold this cycle & is in a new BEAR MARKET versus gold. Even a harsh gold correction won't change that now.

items.content:
BREAKING: Global debt surged +$8 trillion in Q3 2025, to a record $346 TRILLION.

Debt balances of developed countries rose to a record $231 trillion, while emerging-market debt jumped to $115 trillion, an all-time high.

The US and China accounted for nearly 33% of the increase.
items.content_text_vi:
